#summary Top level introduction to Moveable Weather

= Introduction =
Moveable Weather is a voice enabled location based mashup, that uses Google's Weather API, to read you your local weather. Key components of the application, which runs on Google's App Engine, are described below.
= Details =

  * [GeoModel GeoModel module]
  * [BulkUpload App Engine Bulk Loader facility]
  * [GoogleWeatherAPI Google Weather API]
  * [Authentication Authentication]
  * [ReverseGeoCoding Reverse geocoding]
  * [Tropo the Tropo voice interface]
  * [Demo Demo]
